arts.ttl: Hoffenheim plan to dump Grillitsch, Sky reports
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that newly installed TSG 1899 Hoffenheim trainer Christian Ilzer has no use for club veteran Florian Grillitsch.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim mount dramatic comeback late on to stun RB Leipzig in seven-goal thriller
arts.sum: Adam Hložek scored twice, Tom Bischof netted his first senior goal, and super-sub Jacob Bruun Larsen snatched a late winner on Christian Ilzer's managerial debut. Tom Bischof celebrates his first senior goal for Hoffenheim, curling in a crucial equaliser from a free-kick to draw his side level for the second time in the match against Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Christian Ilzer off to a dream start at Hoffenheim
arts.sum: The Austrian probably could not have imagined that his debut would be the rollercoaster it was, but it did culminate in the first time ever that the home side had won a Bundesliga game in which they had been trailing three times. They even managed to find a winner in the end, capping off a fantastic debut for new head coach Christian Ilzer.

arts.ttl: Marco Rose’s RB Leipzig slip up in Bundesliga title race
arts.sum: “We’re incredibly disappointed” – Christoph Baumgartner played the full 90 minutes as RB Leipzig collapsed against Hoffenheim to fall eight points behind leaders Bayern Munich and come Saturday night, they…

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leverkusen, Hoffenheim, Dortmund, Stuttgart, and Wolfsburg all victorious
arts.sum: There were no draws in the latest set of five Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs. Czech internationals Patrik Schick (Leverkusen) and Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) were instrumental in helping their teams complete comeback victories. Elsewhere, Stuttgart and Dortmund took care of business with clinical home wins. Wolfsburg also secured their first home win of the season. Coverage of all five simultaneous kickoffs can be found below.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. Leipzig preview: The Christian Ilzer era starts now
arts.sum: Christian Ilzer will take charge of his first game as Hoffenheim boss when his side face RB Leipzig in Saturday’s Bundesliga encounter.
Action from the German top flight returns after the international break and Alex Jack is on hand to provide score predictions for all nine Bundesliga games this weekend.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
